subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Mr. Comiskey, grandson of the Chicago White Sox founder, was a former front-office executive and co-owner during the Go Go Sox years in the 1950s.
snippet: Mr. Comiskey, grandson of the Chicago White Sox founder, was a former front-office executive and co-owner during the Go Go Sox years in the 1950s.
